mapper.update: DELETE FROM qb_news_home_hotword; SET @rownum1 = 21; SET @rownum2 = 21; INSERT INTO qb_news_home_hotword ( label_id, `scope`, order_num, create_time, update_time ) SELECT * FROM( SELECT a.label_id, 'bulletin' scope, @rownum1 := @rownum1 - 1 AS order_num, now() create_time, now() update_time FROM ( SELECT t1.label_id label_id, COUNT( 1 ) count FROM `qb_news_bulletin_label` t1 inner join `qb_news_label` t2 on t1.label_id = t2.id and t2.classify = 2 WHERE DATEDIFF( (SELECT create_time FROM `qb_news_bulletin_label` t3 ORDER BY t3.create_time desc limit 1), t1.create_time ) <= 1 GROUP BY t1.label_id ) a ORDER BY a.count DESC LIMIT 20 ) c UNION ALL SELECT * FROM ( SELECT b.label_id, 'news' scope, @rownum2 := @rownum2 - 1 AS order_num, now() create_time, now() update_time FROM ( SELECT t1.label_id label_id, COUNT( 1 ) count FROM `qb_news_public_opinion_label` t1 inner join `qb_news_label` t2 on t1.label_id = t2.id and t2.classify = 2 WHERE DATEDIFF( (SELECT create_time FROM `qb_news_public_opinion_label` t3 ORDER BY t3.create_time desc limit 1), t1.create_time ) <= 1 GROUP BY t1.label_id ) b ORDER BY b.count DESC LIMIT 20 ) d;
